how do you mount or decompress this file, tried winrar and magiciso no go, someone said burn as image file tried image burn no go allso, can someone help please. Thanks

@thewoodishard 
You cannot mount Windows Installation File When you going to install new windows.

You will need to buy 4.7GB DVD/CD and use ImgBurn 2.5.5.0
Download it here:
http://www.filehippo.com/download_imgburn/

Step1: Insert Clean DVD/CD
and do not do nothing yet with the DVD/CD

Stem2: Open ImgBurn 2.5.5.0
(Vista/Win 7 Run as admin)

Then press there "Write image file to disc"
Then Choose maximum write speed to 4x (Safe)

Then Press the icon with "File -> DVD"
(Its big icon near there u will see it)

Then you need to add what file you wanna write to DVD/CD

Find the place you downloaded/Moved then win 7 Ultimate .iso file and doble click on it and your burning must start.

Wait when done and try it.

Im sorry for asking so many questions, im new to mounting and downloading an OS.

1. Yes it has both
2. Yes you can mount if installing and just run the setup if upgrading from Vista, however a clean install is recommended
3. Either or, however a clean install is always recommended.
